definitions.text: the circulation of cytoplasm within a cell
to extend, wave or float outward, as if in the wind
examples: their manes streamed like stiff black pennants in the wind
people were pouring out of the theater
Put on your rain coat-- it's pouring outside!

definitions.text: exuding a bodily fluid in profuse amounts
(computer science) using or relating to a form of continuous tape transport; used mainly to provide backup storage of unedited data
